reasoning: Looking at both screenshots, the key difference is in the header layout. In the incorrect version, the header links are centered, but in the correct version, the action links on the right side (PL, SEARCH, STORES, LOG IN, BAG) appear right-aligned. This suggests that the justify-content property for the '.header__links--actions' class should be changed from 'center' to 'flex-end' to push these items to the right side of their container.
